name: Icon Utility
changelog:
10.19:
 • Updated to display progress on dock icon.
 • Updater Script is now standalone and localized.
 • Fixed layout bug of release notes to replace newlines correctly.

10.18:
 • New updated software updater script can read and display release notes.
 • Fixed bug where apple quarantined files would not get processed before quitting.
longDescription:
Convert Any File Type to ICNS


Supports all file types supported by your Mac including jpeg, png, tiff, and gif.

Just drag and drop and Icon Utility instantly converts from image to icns, icns to iconset, and iconset to icns.
